Question.Subject: Can I order anything off the internet from anywhere?
Question.Content:
(I live in Canada)
I'm browsing online for prom dresses and I'm going through, which I think to believe are, American promgirl sites .. Does it matter if I live in Canada or not ? Is it always possible to buy anything online? There are these prom dresses that are super nice .. I just don't want to get too excited if I'm not able to purchase them!
Please help! I can't wait to order my prom dress soon! Thaaaaanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: Certain places may or may not ship internationally. *USUALLY* US places will ship to Canada (which I like to call North United States ;-) ), but you should contact them to find out just in case.

Answer.Content: Certain places may or may not ship internationally. *USUALLY* US places will ship to Canada (which I like to call North United States ;-) ), but you should contact them to find out just in case.

i think you can order anything from internet, where ever you are. you should try amazon.com for online shop.
visit my blog :D http://phonegenic.com/
